db:abstract.db:para: Creates C++ header files for source and replica types from the Qt Remote Objects .rep files.

db:article.db:para: This command was introduced in Qt 6.2.

db:section.db:title: Description
db:section.db:para: Runs repc and generates Qt Remote Objects Replica and Qt Remote Objects Source header files based on the given rep_files combined in a single header. Adds the generated files to <TARGET>.

db:section.db:title: Examples
db:section.db:para: The generated file(s) will be of the form rep_<replica file name>_merged.h, in this case rep_simpleswitch_merged.h

db:note.db:para: Typically sources and replicas live in separate processes or devices, so this function is not commonly used.
